mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.scheme_code, s.scheme_name, s.project_id, s.version, s.description, s.creator_id, u.company AS creator_company, s.status, s.create_time, s.update_time FROM scheme s LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON s.creator_id = u.id WHERE project_id = #{projectId} ORDER BY s.create_time DESC

SELECT s.id, s.scheme_code, s.scheme_name, s.project_id, s.version, s.description, s.creator_id, u.company AS creator_company, s.status, s.create_time, s.update_time FROM scheme s LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON s.creator_id = u.id WHERE s.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO scheme ( scheme_code, scheme_name, project_id, version, description, creator_id, status, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{schemeCode}, #{schemeName}, #{projectId}, #{version}, #{description}, #{creatorId}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE scheme SET scheme_code = #{schemeCode}, scheme_name = #{schemeName}, project_id = #{projectId}, version = #{version}, description = #{description}, creator_id = #{creatorId}, status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
